MILK Act of 2023
Milk is Indisputably Liked by Kids Act of 2023
To amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to require schools to offer flavored milk under the school lunch program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Milk is Indisputably Liked by Kids Act of 2023 or the MILK Act of 2023
This bill revises requirements for milk provided by the National School Lunch Program of the Department of Agriculture.
Currently, schools participating in the program may provide lactose-free and flavored and unflavored milk. Under the bill, these schools must offer students flavored milk and maintain the discretion to offer lactose-free milk and unflavored milk.
